mapper.sql: id as id , url as url , orderNum as orderNum , parentId as parentId , number as number , longNumber as longNumber , name as name , creator as creator , createDate as createDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , lastModDate as lastModDate , description as description , modelId as modelId , bizModelName as bizModelName
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sss_resource ( url, orderNum, parentId, number, longNumber, name, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, description, modelId, bizModelName ) VALUES ( #{url}, #{orderNum}, #{parentId}, #{number}, #{longNumber}, #{name}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{description}, #{modelId}, #{bizModelName} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE sss_resource
url = #{url},
orderNum = #{orderNum},
parentId = #{parentId},
number = #{number},
longNumber = #{longNumber},
name = #{name},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
description = #{description},
modelId = #{modelId},
bizModelName = #{bizModelName},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE sss_resource
url = #{map.url},
orderNum = #{map.orderNum},
parentId = #{map.parentId},
number = #{map.number},
longNumber = #{map.longNumber},
name = #{map.name},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
description = #{map.description},
modelId = #{map.modelId},
bizModelName = #{map.bizModelName},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sss_resource ( url, orderNum, parentId, number, longNumber, name, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, description, modelId, bizModelName ) VALUES ( #{map.url}, #{map.orderNum}, #{map.parentId}, #{map.number}, #{map.longNumber}, #{map.name}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.description}, #{map.modelId}, #{map.bizModelName} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
, id
, url
, orderNum
, parentId
, number
, longNumber
, name
, creator
, createDate
, lastModifier
, lastModDate
, description
, modelId
, bizModelName
FROM sss_resource
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND url like CONCAT('%', #{condition.url} , '%')
AND orderNum like CONCAT('%', #{condition.orderNum} , '%')
AND parentId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.parentId} , '%')
AND number like CONCAT('%', #{condition.number} , '%')
AND longNumber like CONCAT('%', #{condition.longNumber} , '%')
AND name like CONCAT('%', #{condition.name} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND description like CONCAT('%', #{condition.description} , '%')
AND modelId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.modelId} , '%')
AND bizModelName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.bizModelName} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
